mapper.insert: insert into PAPER (paperId, conference, cites, likes, lastUpdate, title) values (#{paperId}, #{conference},#{cites}, #{likes}, #{lastUpdate}, #{title})

insert into PAPER (paperId, title, submitter, comments, journalRef, doi, categories, license, summary, version, update_date) values (#{paperId}, #{title}, #{submitter}, #{comments}, #{journalRef}, #{doi}, #{categories}, #{license}, #{summary}, #{version}, #{update_date})
mapper.update: update PAPER set cites=#{updateParam.cites}, likes=#{updateParam.likes}, conference=#{updateParam.conference}, lastUpdate = #{updateParam.lastUpdate}, title = #{updateParam.title} where paperId = #{id}
